title: NEMRA IVY- Luxury 3 BR apartment | Dehiwala
details:
Investment for Greater Future!!
NEMRA IVY
*Flexible Payment Method and early bird prices
*Foundation stage
*Project completion end of 2020
*28 modishly designed 3-bedroom and servant/ store room apartment stretched in 07 floors.

NEMRA IVY is set amongst manicured grounds within a private and secure complex. The floor plan incorporates 3- bedroom, kitchen with fully- fitted solid wood pantry cupboards with granite top & flush mount hob with 4 burners and exhaust hood, luxurious bathroom with European standard bathroom fittings with shower cubicle, a spacious living & dining area and a servant/store room. This apartment is ideally positioned to enjoy the proximity of beaches, cafes & restaurants, super markets and fashion chains and a selection of premiere schools. As a resident you will have access to lifestyle amenities including:
*A fully equipped gymnasium
*Reading & relaxing lounge
*Cricket turf with fully covered net
*BBQ grill
*Party area
*Ground floor parking.

Payment Method
*Reservation fee- 500,000/-(LKR)
*Down payment- 20% on the property value
*Balance can be payed on installments up to completion of building
